description: Get the standard/active variation defined by Shopee, which is currently a three-layer tree structure. The top layer is variations, the second layer contains variations_0 and variations_1, and the leaf layer contains variations_2.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful Required for all APIs

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request Required for all requests. Example is 1586168037

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access. Used to identify your permission to use API. Valid for token.valid_seconds of token.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for all APIs

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, and shop_id params. More details at https://partner.test-stable.shopeemobile.com/docs/v2/

parameters.name: error
parameters.description: Indicate error type if any error. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Indicate error details if any error. Empty if no error happened

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: The identifier for API call tracking
